DataElement.preferredName: Text Encapsulation Data Restriction Integrity Checksum ISO21090.Binary.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.:The process or condition of being enclosed.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:Anything that limits; a limitation._The state of being complete or undivided, of being sound or undamaged.:A computed value which depends on the contents of a block of data and which is transmitted or stored along with the data in order to detect corruption of the data. The receiving system recomputes the checksum based upon the received data and compares this value with the one sent with the data. If the two values are the same, the receiver has some confidence that the data was received correctly._A string that is an identifier, and therefore must be either a string representation of an OID, a UUID, or a simple token taken from a lsit of controlled names for the context in which the Uid is used.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Text Encapsulation Data Restriction Integrity Checksum
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.:The process or condition of being enclosed.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:Anything that limits; a limitation._The state of being complete or undivided, of being sound or undamaged.:A computed value which depends on the contents of a block of data and which is transmitted or stored along with the data in order to detect corruption of the data. The receiving system recomputes the checksum based upon the received data and compares this value with the one sent with the data. If the two values are the same, the receiver has some confidence that the data was received correctly.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.:The process or condition of being enclosed.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:Anything that limits; a limitation.

Concepts.definition: The process or condition of being enclosed.
A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

Property.preferredDefinition: The state of being complete or undivided, of being sound or undamaged.:A computed value which depends on the contents of a block of data and which is transmitted or stored along with the data in order to detect corruption of the data. The receiving system recomputes the checksum based upon the received data and compares this value with the one sent with the data. If the two values are the same, the receiver has some confidence that the data was received correctly.

Concepts.definition: The state of being complete or undivided, of being sound or undamaged.

A computed value which depends on the contents of a block of data and which is transmitted or stored along with the data in order to detect corruption of the data. The receiving system recomputes the checksum based upon the received data and compares this value with the one sent with the data. If the two values are the same, the receiver has some confidence that the data was received correctly.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 7/23/2021wz: released for UML model cleanup project.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A string that is an identifier, and therefore must be either a string representation of an OID, a UUID, or a simple token taken from a lsit of controlled names for the context in which the Uid is used.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
